of the enemies, including $(0)!"

"Emergency directive! Defeat all
of the enemies, including $(0)!"

"Enemy reinforcements have been
confirmed! Everyone, maintain
combat formation and take them out!"

"/face2 Good work! We appreciate

to deal with this situation!"

"We've got some extra enemies...

"敵性存在の追加出現を確認。
各員は目標の排除を。"

適切な対応でした。"

これで一段落ですね！
